EXTRACTED VALUE: It would seem Polyphony Digital’s claim that Gran Turismo is the world’s ‘Real Driving Simulator’ is well and truly under threat.
The Orange Box is the best collection of video games ever to grace a console, and since you bothered to read this review, you know exactly why.
Don't pass on this one. It's more of an experience than a game, and if you own an Xbox 360 it's an experience that absolutely cannot be missed.
